Module com.example.batallanaval
Package com.example.batallanaval.controller

Class GameControllerAdapter

java.lang.Object
com.example.batallanaval.controller.GameControllerAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGameController
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameController
public abstract class GameControllerAdapter extends Object implements IGameController
Abstract adapter class that implements the IGameController interface.

This class provides the main game logic, including board setup, attack handling, turn switching, game state saving, and UI management.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Juan Esteban Arias, Junior Lasprilla Prada, Steven Fernando Arag√≥n
